title: Nets Suspend Kyrie Irving Indefinitely After Antisemitic Movie Post
description: Irving posted a link to an antisemitic movie last week but has declined to apologize. His suspension will last at least five games.
dc:creator: Tania Ganguli
category: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

media:content.media:description: Nets guard Kyrie Irving distanced himself from some of the false assertions made in an antisemitic movie he linked to on Twitter last week.
